availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William M. Ends, Sr. (Lincoln County, KY, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Stanford, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Lucy Ann Bolwin. Father of Sarah A. Ends, Martha Ends, Lucia A. Ends, Eliza C. Ends, William M. Ends, Mary F. Ends, Margaret E. Ends, Nancy P. Ends, Hiram T. Ends, and Harrison Ends. Farmer in Garrard County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident in Lincoln County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from September 13, 1862 to September 17, 1863. Served in the 4th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from November 11, 1864 to August 17, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1, p. 241B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, p. 81.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 211.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0181.
Find A Grave, "Wm. Ends (1810-1872),"Memorial #22423057, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22423057 (accessed February 13, 2020).
